Desc.entry: An association of East Midlands Caving Clubs for those with an interest in caving and mining societies. Holds Cavers Fair and training events. Works with landowners to maintain access to caves and abandoned mines of historical interest. Also works with statutory bodies to ensure the conservation of caves. Members of clubs and individual members carry out voluntary conservation work related to caves.

Pubs.entry: DCA newsletter; Information circular (also posted on website); "Peak District Access and Rigging Guide"; "Caves of the Peak District"; Cave Conservation publications

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Hold advertised training events at irregular intervals
